cards.title: Spellforge
powers: Draw a card. If you have discarded any cards this turn, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Great, now I'm going to have to talk.

cards.title: Ray
body: You may discard a Prefix card to add its [u]Prefix[/u] text to this card.
You may discard a Suffix card to add its [u]Suffix[/u] text to this card.
{Spellforge} deals 1 Target 5 Energy Damage.

cards.title: Shock
body: You may discard a Prefix card to add its [u]Prefix[/u] text to this card.
You may discard a Suffix card to add its [u]Suffix[/u] text to this card.
{Spellforge} deals 3 Targets 4 Lightning Damage.

cards.title: Wave
body: You may discard a Prefix card to add its [u]Prefix[/u] text to this card.
You may discard a Suffix card to add its [u]Suffix[/u] text to this card.
{Spellforge} deals 5 Targets 3 Sonic Damage.

cards.title: Impact
body: You may discard a Prefix card to add its [u]Prefix[/u] text to this card.
You may discard a Suffix card to add its [u]Suffix[/u] text to this card.
{Spellforge} deals each Target 2 Melee Damage.

cards.title: Controlled
body: You may play up to 2 cards now.
[u]Prefix[/u]: This effect's damage is reduced to 1 when targetting Hero Targets.

cards.title: Inspired
body: Draw 3 cards.
[u]Prefix[/u]: This effect's damage is increased by 1.

cards.title: Piercing
body: One Hero may use a power.
[u]Prefix[/u]: This effect's damage is Irreducible.

cards.title: of Aura
body: You may destroy an Environment card. Draw a card.
[u]Suffix[/u]: After a Hero is dealt damage this way, their player draws a card.

cards.title: of Disruption
body: You may destroy an Ongoing card. Draw a card.
[u]Suffix[/u]: After a non-Hero Target is dealt damage this way, it deals itself 1 Sonic Damage.

cards.title: of Healing
body: {Spellforge} Regains 2 HP. Draw a card.
[u]Suffix[/u]: After a Hero Target is dealt damage this way, it regains 3 HP.

cards.title: of Resonance
body: {Spellforge} deals 1 Target 2 Sonic Damage. Draw a card.
[u]Suffix[/u]: After a non-Hero Target is dealt damage this way, {Spellforge} deals it 1 Sonic Damage.

cards.title: Articulate the Lethological
body: Select Essence, Prefix, or Suffix.
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 2 cards of the selected type. Put each of those cards to your hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.
You may play a card.
